scene: listen to only Christmas music for the rest of your life
make out with a stalker that has threatened your life, for 30 minutes
only be able to eat/drink protien shakes for the rest of your life
never be able to use any Google products ever again
not kill someone but have everyone think you did
have all limbs surgically removed
get severe hiccups every 15 minutes
be buried alive with a blowtorch & man eating ants
have a deep itch that takes more than 20 scratches that show up every minute
need permission before being able to do absolutely anything
know the exact place & time of your death
never be able to wear socks and shoes ever again
jump from a 1 story roof & land onto scattered legos barefoot
pee your pants once a week at a random time
work 4 days a week but work 20 hour days
have absolutely no one you have met or will meet like or respect you
bare knuckle fight a pissed off Mike Tyson in his prime
only be able to use the internet 20 minutes a day
have to pay the government a tax for every word you speak
have to eat a very moldy meal once a week
lick the seat of every porta potty at Cochella
intentionally break a glass bottle on your own head not covered by insurance
erase every computer from history
have to pay EVERYTHING in nothing but pennies for the rest of your life
get kicked in the genitalia everytime you use a noun
gain super-human sense of smell, but only for horrible vomit enducing smells
have ANY teeth you have fall out if you don't whistle for at least 1 out of evey 4 hours
be 1/100 humans to survive a major catestrophic event
not able remember anything new from this point on & have your memory reset every 6 hours
volunteer for a pointless space mission that has a 25% chance of returning to Earth
have something installed into your eyes that permanently show advertisments that block 80% of your vision
be limited to communicate one word a minute
have your total bank balances taken away from you every 24 hours
replace every cat & dog on Earth with a brain eating zombie
have everything you consume with water be replaced with dirty bath water
jam a tooth pick into your big toe nail & kick the wall as hard as you can
hear all voices & sounds at an annoying nails-on-chalkboard high pitch
have a childhood bully embarrassingly come out of nowhere & pants you anytime you try to make a good impression
have all the favorite parts of songs you like be replaced with the Amber Alert noise, & you forget it will happen every time
have to lick a persons face every time they say a sentence to you
have to drink nothing but earwax whenever you get thirsty
have to step on a set bear trap until it slams shut on your leg every 9 months
be stuck on a space station alone with no communication but have lifetime supply of canned beans & water, with 100% certainty of rescue, but not sure if it will be in 1 hour or 25 years
have to rip out all of your hair & every finger & toe nail once a year with no anesthetics
always feel like you're about to sneeze
